The dress is comfortable, flattering, and comes in multiple colors, with one customer noting the pleats on the back are very flattering. While some it fits nicely, others find it too tight around the chest area, and while some say it's true to size, others mention it runs a tad large. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Summer Work Dress!
items.body: With these NYC heatwaves, I was on the hunt for something lightweight but still polished enough for the office—and this PRETTYGARDEN dress delivered all that and more. The material is breathable and comfortable, making it ideal for commuting and sitting through meetings without breaking a sweat. What I love most is the versatility. The gold buttons elevate the look, adding a touch of elegance that makes it easy to dress up with heels and a blazer. But it’s just as cute with flats for a more casual day or even a stroll through the park after work. The fit is structured and flattering, with just enough stretch to move comfortably throughout the day. It’s well made, available in multiple colors (yes, I’ve got my eye on a second one!), and with a pair of tights and a cardigan, I can definitely see myself transitioning this into the fall. Highly recommend for anyone looking to stay cool, stylish, and professional this summer! Read more
items.author: MsCatrinaRayanne

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buy it!
items.body: This dress is perfection! Fits like a dream, super flattering, very comfortable, and looks soo classy! The perfect fall dress! Read more
items.author: Sier

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great dress, very elegant for a graduation dress
items.body: I loved the dress, and would highly recommend. I was surprised at the quality of the material. It is double lined/thick material, and the white dress was not see-through at all. I wore it for my master's graduation, and found it very comfortable and flattering. I am 5'6, and was satisfied to find that it was not too short on me (it rested slightly above my knee). The pleats on the back are very flattering, and the zipper is also hidden into a pleat, making the dress very seamless and elegant. Great value for the money, and have no regrets. Read more
items.author: Hannah

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very classy!!!
items.body: Great quality! Looks very professional and expensive. I got many compliments. I am normally a medium-large and it wasn’t too tight but looked fitting. Highly recommend. Read more
items.author: Maria Gancarczyk

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful, but runs very large
items.body: Beautiful dress, but much too large. Purchased a small, was a great length, but too large in the torso and chest/shoulder area. I am 5’ 8”, 141 pounds, 32C/D for reference. The dress hit about mid thigh on me, but I do have long legs. This dress would be absolutely stunning on a bigger body, but would not recommend for athletic builds. The buttons are fake, but overall I was impressed with the material. Disappointed they don’t offer sizes smaller than S Read more
items.author: kat

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Material inconsistent in sizes
items.body: I love this dress! I ordered a small, medium and large size. The size that fit me best is Medium. The only problem is I noticed the material for the small and large dress is the same, it’s stretchy and very firm fitting. The material for the medium dress is completely different, it’s tight and nylon style not stretchy. I want my medium dress in the fabric of the small and large size of this dress. FIX THIS PLEASE, I’m about to re-order the medium again and hope it’s the correct fabric like the size and large size of this dress this time. You see even the plastic bags they come from are different. Read more
items.author: Lija

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress!!
items.body: Love ❤️ this dress!! It fits nicely. The buttons make it look dressy and it is very comfortable. I like that it doesn't wrinkle when you wear it! It is a nice length too. Read more
items.author: Deb Hanks

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute for Work
items.body: Really cute work dress. The fabric easily tears a bit but all in all it’s a great dress if taken care of. Read more
items.author: Danny

short_description:
Womens Dress Sleeveless Formal is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Dress Sleeveless Formal is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Brown, Khaki, Pink, Blue, Dark Khaki, Grey Blue, Apricot, Army Green, Black, Peach Pink, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
